vote.text: Amendment SA 3971 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3971 proposed by Senator Blumenthal for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6307; text: CR S6307) To amend the resolving clause.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3971 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3971 proposed by Senator Blumenthal for Senator Feinstein.
